name: NSCollectionViewGridLayout
desc: A layout that displays a single section of items in a row and column grid.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfRows: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of rows to display in the collection view’s visible area.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfColumns: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of columns to display in the collection view’s visible area.

items.name: var minimumItemSize: NSSize
items.desc: The smallest allowable size for an item’s view.

items.name: var maximumItemSize: NSSize
items.desc: The largest allowable size for an item’s view.

items.name: var minimumInteritemSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum spacing (in points) to use between items in the same row or column.

items.name: var minimumLineSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum spacing (in points) to use between rows or columns.

items.name: var margins: NSEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of empty space (in points) around the grid’s content.

items.name: var backgroundColors: [NSColor]!
items.desc: The array of background colors to use when drawing the grid.
